javadoc:
Exception class to be used when API calls are improperly used (i.e., GhidraScript.askProjectFolder() method is
 being used in Headless mode).

methods.javadoc:
Constructs a new improper use exception with the specified detail message.
@param msg the detail message
methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Constructs a new improper use exception with the specified detail message.

methods.javadoc:
Constructs a new exception with the specified cause
@param cause the cause of the exception
methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Constructs a new exception with the specified cause

name: ImproperUseException
comment:
Exception class to be used when API calls are improperly used (i.e., GhidraScript.askProjectFolder() method is
 being used in Headless mode).
